patterns: i have a bit of the cold
responses: Common symptoms for covid-19 include a dry cough, fever and tiredness. Less common symptoms include loss of smell, dizziness and rashes.
Wash your hands regularly, avoid touching your eyes, nose and mouth with your hands, and stay away from crowded spaces!

patterns: when will a vaccine be ready
responses: To date there is no vaccine and no specific antiviral medicine to prevent or treat covid-19
Hi there, how can I help?
We will get through this together, see you again!
